CustomField.description: Enter the name of the BPM or workflow system in this field, if the account has an existing BPM or workflow system. If no BPM or workflow system exists, enter >None<!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the BPM or workflow system in this field, if the account has an existing BPM or workflow system. If no BPM or workflow system exists, enter >None<!
CustomField.label: Name of BPM or workflow system
